pages.title: Transmutation Table
pages.text: You just reach the way to make Bedrockium Coal !$(br)To work, Transmutation Table need $(6)1000 RF/T $()to work $(br) One coal in each input slots inside machine. 16 coals max /slots$(br)Take 1 minute to process items
Also, Transmutation Table need to place up level 150 and set a tower of 8 Framed Bedrock with a Diamond block above.$(br2)$(6)Sneak Right click on Transmutation Table to start helper!$()
